item.title: Help on rs2 R.S.P.S
item.dc:creator: @tonypker13 tonypker13
item.description:
@tonypker13 wrote:

That’s considered spam.

now, yes this does fail… But I’ll help you out.

else if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("dp")&& playerRights >= 3){
ItemHandler.addItem(1038, absX, absY, playerItemsN[1], playerId, false);
ItemHandler.addItem(1040, absX+1, absY+1, playerItemsN[1], playerId, false);

}
